entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with flurries near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
